title: Two blades of grass [excerpt]
creator_credit: CSIRO. Film Unit and S.T. Evans
brief_description: Develops the theme that Australia’s agricultural future could depend on the use of a properly fertilised legume. The role of the legume nodule in this respect and in opening up new areas is stressed. Excerpt from Title 011252.
